Allowed_Value_Group.description: Grouping category for related allowed values

Allowed_Value_Code.description: Short code identifier for the value

Allowed_Value_Label.description: Display label for the value in user interfaces

Allowed_Value_Description.description: Detailed description of the value and its usage

AllowedValues.description: Stores allowed values for controlled vocabularies used in other tables

Category_Name.description: Name of budget category (e.g., Personnel, Equipment, Travel)

Category_Description.description: Description of what expenses belong in this category

BudgetCategory.description: Reference table for standardized budget categories used in proposals and awards

Organization_Type.description: Type of organization (Department, College, School, Sponsor, Subrecipient, Vendor, Institute, Center)

Parent_Organization_ID.description: Reference to parent organization in hierarchy

UEI.description: Unique Entity Identifier (12-character SAM registration number)

Organization.description: Institutional entities (not individuals) that participate in research funding flows - includes sponsors that award funding, academic units that receive and administer funding, subrecipients that receive subawards, and vendors that provide goods/services

ORCID.description: Open Researcher and Contributor ID in format XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Middle_Name.description: Middle name or initial of individual

Person_Type.description: Type of personnel (Faculty, Staff, Student, External, Postdoc, Resident, Fellow)

Personnel.description: Stores information about individuals involved in projects and awards

ContactDetails_ID.description: Primary key for contact detail record

Personnel_ID.description: Reference to personnel (mutually exclusive with Organization_ID)

Organization_ID.description: Reference to organization (mutually exclusive with Personnel_ID)

AllowedValue_ID.description: Type of contact (Email, Phone, Fax) from AllowedValues

ContactDetails_Value.description: The actual contact value (email address, phone number, etc.)

ContactDetails.description: Stores contact information for personnel and organizations

IndirectRate_ID.description: Primary key for indirect rate record

Organization_ID.description: Organization to which this indirect cost rate applies

Rate_Type.description: Type of indirect rate (On-Campus, Off-Campus, MTDC, TDC, Clinical Trial, Fringe Benefits, Facilities, Administrative)

Effective_End_Date.description: Date when rate expires (NULL if still active)

Base_Type.description: Base type for rate calculation (MTDC, TDC, Salaries and Wages, Direct Salaries)

Negotiated_Agreement_ID.description: Reference to negotiated rate agreement document

IndirectRate.description: Negotiated indirect cost rates (F&A rates) for organizations
IndirectRate.synonyms: F&A Rates, Overhead Rates, IDC Rates, NICRA

Acronym.description: Short acronym or abbreviation for project

Parent_Project_ID.description: Reference to parent project for sub-projects

Project_Type_Value_ID.description: Type of project from AllowedValues (Research, Training, Service, Clinical Trial, Fellowship, Infrastructure, Other)

Abstract.description: Abstract or summary description of project

Project_Status.description: Current status (Planning, Active, Completed, Suspended, Cancelled)

RFA_ID.description: Primary key for request for application

RFA_Number.description: Official RFA or funding opportunity number

Program_Code.description: Program code or activity code for the opportunity

Opportunity_Number.description: Grants.gov or other system opportunity number

CFDA_Number.description: Catalog of Federal Domestic Assistance number

RFA.description: Represents Request for Applications or funding announcements

Project_ID.description: Associated project (may be NULL for new projects)

Sponsor_Organization_ID.description: Organization to which proposal is submitted

Administering_Organization_ID.description: Organization that will administer the award if funded

Previous_Proposal_ID.description: Reference to previous related proposal (renewals, resubmissions)

Internal_Approval_Status.description: Internal approval status (Draft, In Review, Approved, Rejected, Withdrawn)

Decision_Status.description: Sponsor decision status (Pending, Submitted, Under Review, Awarded, Declined, Withdrawn)

ProposalBudget_ID.description: Primary key for proposal budget line item

Period_Number.description: Budget period number (typically 1-5 for multi-year budgets)

BudgetCategory_ID.description: Budget category for this line item

Line_Item_Description.description: Description of specific budget line item

Direct_Cost.description: Direct cost amount for this line item

Indirect_Cost.description: Indirect cost amount for this line item

Total_Cost.description: Total cost (direct + indirect) for this line item

Applied_Indirect_Rate_ID.description: Indirect rate applied to this line item

Rate_Base_Used.description: Base type used for indirect rate calculation (MTDC, TDC, Salaries and Wages, Direct Salaries)

Version_No.description: Budget version number for tracking revisions

ProposalBudget.description: Detailed budget line items for proposals by period and category

Proposal_ID.description: Proposal that resulted in this award

Current_Total_Funded.description: Current total funded amount including modifications

Current_End_Date.description: Current project period end date (may differ from original due to extensions)

Total_Anticipated_Funding.description: Total anticipated funding over full award life

Award_Status.description: Current status (Pending, Active, Closed, Suspended, Terminated)

CFDA_Number.description: Catalog of Federal Domestic Assistance number

Federal_Award_ID.description: Federal award identification number for federal awards

Prime_Sponsor_Organization_ID.description: Ultimate funding source for flow-through awards

Flow_Through_Indicator.description: Flag indicating if this is a flow-through award

Event_Type_Value_ID.description: Type of modification event from AllowedValues (Initial Award, Incremental Funding, No Cost Extension, Budget Revision, Scope Change, Personnel Change, Termination, Supplement, Carryforward, Administrative Change)

Event_Timestamp.description: Date and time modification was recorded in system

Funding_Amount_Change.description: Change in funding amount (positive or negative)

New_End_Date.description: New end date if modification includes date extension

Affected_Personnel_ID.description: Personnel affected by modification (for personnel changes)

Impact_on_Budget.description: Flag indicating if modification impacts budget

Requires_Prior_Approval.description: Flag indicating if sponsor prior approval was required

Approval_Status.description: Status of approval (Pending, Approved, Rejected, Not Required)

Modification.description: Award modifications tracking funding changes, extensions, and amendments

Payment_Method.description: Payment method (Reimbursement, Advance, Cost-Reimbursement, Fixed-Price, Letter-of-Credit, Payment-Request)

Invoicing_Frequency.description: How often invoices should be submitted (Monthly, Quarterly, Semi-Annual, Annual, Upon-Request, Milestone)

Invoice_Submission_Days.description: Number of days allowed for invoice submission after period end

Special_Conditions.description: Special terms and conditions of the award

Record_Retention_Years.description: Number of years records must be retained

Terms.description: Terms and conditions for awards including payment, reporting, and special requirements

AwardBudgetPeriod_ID.description: Primary key for award budget period

Period_Status.description: Status of period (Pending, Released, Active, Closed)

AwardBudgetPeriod.description: Budget periods for awards with funding amounts and dates

Award_Budget_ID.description: Primary key for award budget line item

Award_ID.description: Award this budget line belongs to

AwardBudgetPeriod_ID.description: Budget period this line belongs to

Current_Direct_Cost.description: Current direct cost amount after modifications

Current_Indirect_Cost.description: Current indirect cost amount after modifications

Current_Total_Cost.description: Current total cost amount after modifications

Rate_Base_Used.description: Base type used for indirect rate calculation (MTDC, TDC, Salaries and Wages, Direct Salaries)

AwardBudget.description: Detailed budget line items for awards by budget period and category

Subaward_Status.description: Current status (Pending, Active, Closed, Terminated, Suspended)

PI_Name.description: Name of principal investigator at subrecipient institution

Subaward.description: Represents subawards issued under prime awards

CostShare_ID.description: Primary key for cost share commitment

Commitment_Type.description: Type of cost share (Cash, In-Kind, Third-Party, Waived IDC)

Source_Fund_Code.description: Fund code for cost share source

Is_Mandatory.description: Flag indicating if cost share is mandatory or voluntary

Met_Amount.description: Amount of cost share commitment actually met

CostShare.description: Cost sharing commitments and contributions for awards

Period_Start_Date.description: Start date of period covered by invoice

Period_End_Date.description: End date of period covered by invoice

Cost_Share.description: Cost share amount reported on invoice

Invoice_Status.description: Status (Draft, Submitted, Under Review, Approved, Paid, Rejected)

Submission_Date.description: Date invoice was submitted to sponsor

Invoice.description: Invoices submitted to sponsors for reimbursement or payment

Deliverable_Type_Value_ID.description: Type of deliverable from AllowedValues (Technical Progress Report, Financial Report, Annual Report, Final Technical Report, Final Financial Report, Property Report, Invention Disclosure, Animal Welfare Report, Data Submission, Software Release, Clinical Trial Registration, Publication, Presentation, Material Transfer, Other)

AwardBudgetPeriod_ID.description: Budget period deliverable is due for

Deliverable_Status.description: Status (Pending, In Progress, Submitted, Accepted, Revision Required, Overdue)

AwardDeliverable.description: Required deliverables and reports for awards with due dates and status tracking

Role_Value_ID.description: Role type from AllowedValues (PI, Co-PI, Co-I, Key Personnel, etc.)

Is_Key_Personnel.description: Flag indicating if this is key personnel

FTE_Percent.description: Full-time equivalent percentage allocated to role

ProjectRole.description: Personnel roles and assignments on projects with effort allocation

Fund_Code.description: Primary key fund code from institutional accounting system

Fund.description: Fund codes from institutional accounting system

Account_Code.description: Primary key account code from chart of accounts

Account_Category.description: Category of account describing the nature of the expense (e.g., Salaries, Supplies, Equipment, Travel)

Account_Type.description: Type of account (Expense, Revenue, Asset, Liability, Equity)

Parent_Account_Code.description: Parent account for hierarchical chart of accounts

Account.description: Chart of accounts for financial transactions and general ledger coding

Purpose_Value_ID.description: Purpose of finance code from AllowedValues (Direct Costs, Cost Share, Indirect Costs, Subcontract, Department Share, Program Income, Other)

FinanceCode.description: Finance system codes linking awards to institutional accounting strings

Fund_Code.description: Fund code transaction is charged to

Account_Code.description: Account code transaction is charged to

Finance_Code.description: Finance code transaction is charged to

Fiscal_Period.description: Fiscal period of transaction (typically 1-12 for months)

Transaction_Type_Value_ID.description: Type of transaction from AllowedValues (Expense, Revenue, Encumbrance, Transfer, Adjustment, Reversal, Cost Share)

AwardBudgetPeriod_ID.description: Budget period transaction is associated with

Personnel_ID.description: Personnel associated with transaction (for salary transactions)

Is_Reconciled.description: Flag indicating if transaction has been reconciled

Transaction.description: Financial transactions charged to awards from institutional accounting system

ProjectRole_ID.description: Project role this effort record belongs to

Period_Start_Date.description: Start date of effort reporting period

Period_End_Date.description: End date of effort reporting period

Variance_Percent.description: Variance between committed and actual effort

Is_Certified.description: Flag indicating if effort has been certified

Certification_Method.description: Method used for certification (PAR, Activity Report, Timesheet, Other)

Requires_Prior_Approval.description: Flag indicating if variance requires sponsor prior approval

Prior_Approval_Status.description: Status of prior approval (Not Required, Pending, Approved, Denied)

Effort.description: Effort certification and tracking for personnel time charged to projects

Requirement_Title.description: Title of compliance requirement or protocol

Requirement_Type.description: Type of requirement (IRB, IACUC, IBC, COI, Radiation, Other)

Review_Type.description: Type of review (Exempt, Expedited, Full Board, Not Human Subjects, Administrative)

Requirement_Status.description: Current status (Draft, Submitted, In Review, Approved, Expired, Conditional Approval, Disapproved, Terminated, Suspended, Closed)

Approval_Body.description: Name of approving committee or body

Risk_Level.description: Risk level assessment (Minimal, More than Minimal, High)

ComplianceRequirement.description: Regulatory compliance requirements (IRB, IACUC, IBC, COI) for projects

ConflictOfInterest_ID.description: Primary key for conflict of interest disclosure

Relationship_Type_Value_ID.description: Type of relationship from AllowedValues (Financial, Consulting, Employment, Equity, Intellectual Property, Board Membership, Family, Other)

Entity_Name.description: Name of entity involved in potential conflict

Relationship_Description.description: Description of relationship and potential conflict

ConflictOfInterest_Status.description: Status (Under Review, No Conflict, Manageable Conflict, Unmanageable Conflict, Management Plan Required, Cleared)

ConflictOfInterest.description: Conflict of interest disclosures and management plans for personnel

Document_Type_Value_ID.description: Type of document from AllowedValues (Proposal, Progress Report, Financial Report, Final Report, Closeout Document, Award Notice, Modification, Correspondence, Compliance Approval, Budget, SOW, Contract, Subaward, Invoice, Receipt, Data Submission, Software Release, Publication, Presentation, Other)

Related_Entity_Type.description: Type of entity document is related to (Award, Proposal, Project, ComplianceRequirement, Subaward, Organization, Personnel, Invoice, AwardDeliverable, ConflictOfInterest)

MIME_Type.description: MIME type of document (e.g., application/pdf, image/jpeg)

File_Hash.description: Cryptographic hash for file integrity verification (SHA-256, SHA-512, etc.)

Document.description: Document management system for proposals, awards, reports, and other files

Activity_ID.description: Primary key for activity log entry

Table_Name.description: Name of table that was modified

Record_ID.description: ID of record that was modified

Action_Type.description: Type of action (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, SELECT)

ActivityLog.description: Audit trail of all data changes and user actions in the system

vw_All_ContactDetails.sql:
SELECT
    cd.ContactDetails_ID,
    'Personnel' AS Entity_Type,
    cd.Personnel_ID AS Entity_ID,
    CONCAT(p.First_Name, ' ', p.Last_Name) AS Entity_Name,
    av.Allowed_Value_Label AS Contact_Type,
    cd.ContactDetails_Value AS Contact_Value
FROM ContactDetails cd
JOIN Personnel p ON cd.Personnel_ID = p.Personnel_ID
LEFT JOIN AllowedValues av ON cd.AllowedValue_ID = av.Allowed_Value_ID
WHERE cd.Personnel_ID IS NOT NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT
    cd.ContactDetails_ID,
    'Organization' AS Entity_Type,
    cd.Organization_ID AS Entity_ID,
    o.Organization_Name AS Entity_Name,
    av.Allowed_Value_Label AS Contact_Type,
    cd.ContactDetails_Value AS Contact_Value
FROM ContactDetails cd
JOIN Organization o ON cd.Organization_ID = o.Organization_ID
LEFT JOIN AllowedValues av ON cd.AllowedValue_ID = av.Allowed_Value_ID
WHERE cd.Organization_ID IS NOT NULL
vw_All_ContactDetails.description: Unified view of all contact details from both Personnel and Organizations

vw_Active_Awards.sql:
SELECT
    a.Award_ID,
    a.Award_Number,
    a.Award_Title,
    a.Award_Status,
    a.Current_Total_Funded,
    a.Original_Start_Date,
    a.Current_End_Date,
    o.Organization_Name AS Sponsor_Name,
    p.Project_Title AS Project_Title,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN t.Transaction_Type = 'Expense' THEN t.Transaction_Amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS Total_Expenses,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN t.Transaction_Type = 'Encumbrance' THEN t.Transaction_Amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS Total_Encumbrances,
    a.Current_Total_Funded -
        COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN t.Transaction_Type IN ('Expense','Encumbrance') THEN t.Transaction_Amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS Available_Balance,
    DATEDIFF(a.Current_End_Date, CURRENT_DATE) AS Days_Until_End
FROM Award a
LEFT JOIN Organization o ON a.Sponsor_Organization_ID = o.Organization_ID
LEFT JOIN Project p ON a.Project_ID = p.Project_ID
LEFT JOIN Transaction t ON a.Award_ID = t.Award_ID
WHERE a.Award_Status = 'Active'
GROUP BY a.Award_ID, a.Award_Number, a.Award_Title, a.Award_Status, a.Current_Total_Funded,
         a.Original_Start_Date, a.Current_End_Date, o.Organization_Name, p.Project_Title
vw_Active_Awards.description: Summary of active awards with sponsor information, funding, expenses, and available balance

vw_Active_Personnel_Roles.sql:
SELECT
    pers.Personnel_ID,
    pers.First_Name,
    pers.Last_Name,
    pers.Primary_Email,
    pers.Person_Type,
    proj.Project_ID,
    proj.Project_Title,
    proj.Project_Status AS Project_Status,
    av.Allowed_Value_Label AS Role,
    pr.Is_Key_Personnel,
    pr.Start_Date,
    pr.End_Date,
    pr.FTE_Percent,
    a.Award_Number,
    a.Award_ID,
    a.Award_Status AS Award_Status
FROM Personnel pers
JOIN ProjectRole pr ON pers.Personnel_ID = pr.Personnel_ID
JOIN Project proj ON pr.Project_ID = proj.Project_ID
JOIN AllowedValues av ON pr.Role_Value_ID = av.Allowed_Value_ID
LEFT JOIN Award a ON pr.Funding_Award_ID = a.Award_ID
WHERE (pr.End_Date IS NULL OR pr.End_Date >= CURRENT_DATE)
  AND proj.Project_Status IN ('Active','Planning')
vw_Active_Personnel_Roles.description: Current personnel roles on active projects with effort and award information

vw_Award_Financial_Summary.sql:
SELECT
    a.Award_ID,
    a.Award_Number,
    a.Award_Title,
    a.Current_Total_Funded,
    bp.Period_Number,
    bp.Start_Date AS Period_Start,
    bp.End_Date AS Period_End,
    bp.Total_Costs AS Period_Budget,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN t.Transaction_Type = 'Expense' THEN t.Transaction_Amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS Period_Expenses,
    COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN t.Transaction_Type = 'Encumbrance' THEN t.Transaction_Amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS Period_Encumbrances,
    bp.Total_Costs -
        COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN t.Transaction_Type IN ('Expense','Encumbrance') THEN t.Transaction_Amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS Period_Available
FROM Award a
LEFT JOIN AwardBudgetPeriod bp ON a.Award_ID = bp.Award_ID
LEFT JOIN Transaction t ON bp.AwardBudgetPeriod_ID = t.AwardBudgetPeriod_ID
WHERE a.Award_Status = 'Active'
GROUP BY a.Award_ID, a.Award_Number, a.Award_Title, a.Current_Total_Funded,
         bp.Period_Number, bp.Start_Date, bp.End_Date, bp.Total_Costs
vw_Award_Financial_Summary.description: Financial summary by award and budget period showing budgeted vs actual amounts

vw_Expiring_Awards.sql:
SELECT
    a.Award_ID,
    a.Award_Number,
    a.Award_Title,
    a.Current_End_Date,
    DATEDIFF(a.Current_End_Date, CURRENT_DATE) AS Days_Until_Expiration,
    o.Organization_Name AS Sponsor_Name,
    CONCAT(pers.First_Name, ' ', pers.Last_Name) AS PI_Name,
    pers.Primary_Email AS PI_Email
FROM Award a
JOIN Organization o ON a.Sponsor_Organization_ID = o.Organization_ID
LEFT JOIN ProjectRole pr ON a.Award_ID = pr.Funding_Award_ID
LEFT JOIN AllowedValues av ON pr.Role_Value_ID = av.Allowed_Value_ID
LEFT JOIN Personnel pers ON pr.Personnel_ID = pers.Personnel_ID
WHERE a.Award_Status = 'Active'
  AND a.Current_End_Date BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE AND DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 90 DAY)
  AND av.Allowed_Value_Code = 'PI'
vw_Expiring_Awards.description: Awards expiring within 90 days with sponsor and PI contact information

vw_Overdue_Deliverables.sql:
SELECT
    d.AwardDeliverable_ID,
    d.Deliverable_Type,
    d.Due_Date,
    DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, d.Due_Date) AS Days_Overdue,
    a.Award_Number,
    a.Award_Title AS Award_Title,
    CONCAT(pers.First_Name, ' ', pers.Last_Name) AS Responsible_Person,
    pers.Primary_Email
FROM AwardDeliverable d
JOIN Award a ON d.Award_ID = a.Award_ID
LEFT JOIN Personnel pers ON d.Responsible_Personnel_ID = pers.Personnel_ID
WHERE d.Deliverable_Status IN ('Pending','In Progress','Overdue')
  AND d.Due_Date < CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY d.Due_Date
vw_Overdue_Deliverables.description: Deliverables past their due date with days overdue and responsible person

vw_ComplianceRequirement_Status.sql:
SELECT
    cr.ComplianceRequirement_ID,
    cr.Requirement_Number,
    cr.Requirement_Type,
    cr.Requirement_Title,
    cr.Requirement_Status,
    cr.Initial_Approval_Date,
    cr.Expiration_Date,
    DATEDIFF(cr.Expiration_Date, CURRENT_DATE) AS Days_Until_Expiration,
    CONCAT(pers.First_Name, ' ', pers.Last_Name) AS PI_Name,
    pers.Primary_Email AS PI_Email,
    proj.Project_Title
FROM ComplianceRequirement cr
JOIN Personnel pers ON cr.Principal_Investigator_ID = pers.Personnel_ID
LEFT JOIN Project proj ON cr.Project_ID = proj.Project_ID
WHERE cr.Requirement_Status IN ('Approved','Conditional Approval')
  AND cr.Expiration_Date IS NOT NULL
vw_ComplianceRequirement_Status.description: Active compliance requirements with expiration tracking and PI information

vw_Budget_Comparison.sql:
SELECT
    a.Award_ID,
    a.Award_Number,
    bp.Period_Number,
    bc.Category_Name AS Budget_Category,
    ab.Line_Item_Description,
    pb.Total_Cost AS Proposed_Amount,
    ab.Approved_Total_Cost AS Approved_Amount,
    ab.Current_Total_Cost AS Current_Budget,
    COALESCE(SUM(t.Transaction_Amount), 0) AS Actual_Spent,
    ab.Current_Total_Cost - COALESCE(SUM(t.Transaction_Amount), 0) AS Remaining_Budget,
    CASE
        WHEN ab.Approved_Total_Cost IS NOT NULL AND pb.Total_Cost IS NOT NULL
        THEN ((ab.Approved_Total_Cost - pb.Total_Cost) / pb.Total_Cost * 100)
        ELSE NULL
    END AS Percent_Change_From_Proposal
FROM Award a
JOIN AwardBudgetPeriod bp ON a.Award_ID = bp.Award_ID
LEFT JOIN AwardBudget ab ON bp.AwardBudgetPeriod_ID = ab.AwardBudgetPeriod_ID
LEFT JOIN BudgetCategory bc ON ab.BudgetCategory_ID = bc.BudgetCategory_ID
LEFT JOIN Proposal p ON a.Proposal_ID = p.Proposal_ID
LEFT JOIN ProposalBudget pb ON p.Proposal_ID = pb.Proposal_ID
    AND bp.Period_Number = pb.Period_Number
    AND ab.BudgetCategory_ID = pb.BudgetCategory_ID
    AND (ab.Line_Item_Description = pb.Line_Item_Description
         OR (ab.Line_Item_Description IS NULL AND pb.Line_Item_Description IS NULL))
LEFT JOIN Transaction t ON ab.Award_ID = t.Award_ID
    AND ab.AwardBudgetPeriod_ID = t.AwardBudgetPeriod_ID
WHERE a.Award_Status = 'Active'
GROUP BY a.Award_ID, a.Award_Number, bp.Period_Number, bc.Category_Name,
         ab.Line_Item_Description, pb.Total_Cost, ab.Approved_Total_Cost, ab.Current_Total_Cost
vw_Budget_Comparison.description: Proposed vs approved vs current vs actual spending by award, period, and category
